name: Squares: Are We Alone
description:
Squares: Are We Alone?

This game is set in a square world where the player will play two characters who are father and son, named E37 and CC2. They went on a long journey in search of clues and the existence of a portal to a non-square dimension.

Far outside, there was a dimension that had life like humans today. The dimension contains a box without any other shape. The civilization there looks very different physically from human civilization today. However, from a social perspective, they are like humans on Earth. In the size of a box, lived a familyson named CC2 and father named E37. E37 often goes to libraries to find information about inter-dimensional portals. Day by day passed until one day, E37 found a mysterious book named "The Portal". It is from this book that the search for the existence of the Ubuntu portal begins.
